title: Problemas com o chat da twitch exclusivamente no Firefox
content: Olá bom dia! Estou tendo problemas de conexão com o chat da twitch exclusivamente no Firefox. O que pra mim acaba se tornando um grande problema pois o Firefox é o meu navegador favorito... O que acontece é que o chat fica sofrendo reconexões com frequencia e eu simplesmente paro de receber/visualizar essas novas mensagens que chegam durante esse tempo de "reconexão". E o pior de tudo é que acontece com MUITA frequencia, a cada 5/10 minutos... O que me força a ficar recarregando a pagina (F5) a todo instante para eu poder ver as mensagens que nao recebi. Fui instruída pela twitch para ver a aba de Consoles (F12) mas nao me deram respostas. Entao vou enviar o que acontece para vocês. Seque o anexo:

title: Option to add tab to existing group without changing focus
content:
Hi, I was hoping to find out if there was a way to modify Firefox's desktop behavior so tabs could be added to a group without shifting the focus window/tab or expanding the tab group?

To help clarify my objective, my desired process is to 1. Take some number of mixed tabs 2. Sort them into relevant tab groups 3. Read/use webpages after organizing

So at step 2 it's a small interruption when each tab added to a group changes the browser focus.

As far as I can tell there isn't a way to do this in the settings or the config page but I wanted to double check

Thanks!
creator: joepeguero

title: Why Firefox suddenly became such a garbage ?
content: All 4 of my Firefox installations started sucking big time recently. Unbelievably poor performance loading pages, which was working super fast before. Never had such an issue, running on 4 different, high performance PCs and having same symptoms, where I have to wait for Facebooks posts to load for minute or so. Youtube stops playing in the middle of the video. In meantime if I try same pages on other browsers everything works fast AF. I'm on 1000Mbps connection at office and 500Mbps home. Noticed massive increase in RAM usage, which used to be around 3GB, it is now using 6+. What has happened ?
